title: Virus crisis is chance for India to reform economy
description: India is facing its biggest crisis in decades, with a three-week lockdown in a nation of 1.3 billion people likely to result in economic recession, millions of job losses and possible starvation among the poor. Observers now feel that this could be a chance f…
